name: Ch.11ABaseConvo2
_source: speak;Lute;I've compiled a report on monster sightings in this area.|As a superior mage, it's my duty to inform all combatants.
speak;Lute;Obviously.|Keep your eyes open for unusual movement.|Particularly in the northeastern quadrant.
speak;Lute;Especially be aware of giant arachnids.|Baels have been spotted with increasing frequency.
speak;Lute;Yes, fascinating creatures.|Eight legs, venomous fangs, and the most remarkable fur.
speak;Lute;You've touched a Bael's fur?|How unexpected.
speak;Marisa;Killed one last month.|Its coat was like silk.
speak;Lute;Precisely!|The texture is similar to woven silk from the southern markets of Jehanna.|I've recorded extensive observations on this phenomenon.
speak;Marisa;I kept some.|For my sword grip.
speak;Marisa;They move differently than humans.|Their legs have a pattern.
speak;Lute;You've studied their movement?|I've documented their eight-step locomotion cycle in my bestiary.
speak;Lute;It's the most comprehensive text on magical creatures in existence.|I wrote it myself, obviously.
